metadata.title: CVE-2020-16600 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A Use After Free vulnerability exists in Artifex Software, Inc. MuPDF library 1.17.0-rc1 and earlier when a valid page was followed by a page with invalid pixmap dimensions, causing bander - a static - to point to previously freed memory instead of a newband_writer.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-16600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.17.0+ds1-1.2
mupdf-tools - 1.17.0+ds1-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.17.0+ds1-1.2').
